name: jotai-reloadable
description: this allows jotai/utils/loadable reloadable. you should install jotai to use this module.

scripts.test: CURRPATH=$(pwd)/sample/v2 yarn run sample-test;CURRPATH=$(pwd)/sample/v1.12.1 yarn run sample-test
scripts.clear: cd $CURRPATH; pnpm rm jotai-reloadable; pnpm i jotai-reloadable@file:..
scripts.build-all: rm -rf ./dist; yarn run build; CURRPATH=$(pwd)/sample/v1.12.1 yarn run clear ; CURRPATH=$(pwd)/sample/v2 yarn run clear
scripts.ci:local: CURRPATH=. pnpm run ci:m:local;CURRPATH=$(pwd)/sample/v2 pnpm run ci:m:local;CURRPATH=$(pwd)/sample/v1.12.1 pnpm run ci:m:local
scripts.ci:server: CURRPATH=. yarn run ci:m:server;CURRPATH=$(pwd)/sample/v2 yarn run ci:m:server;CURRPATH=$(pwd)/sample/v1.12.1 yarn run ci:m:server
